title: Virat Kohli breaks record!
news_content: Virat Kohli on Sunday broke the record for smashing most hundreds in the history of IPL. Kohli scored his seventh IPL hundred, overtaking Chris Gayle, who had slammed six hundreds in IPL.
author: Anmol Sharma

title: Building collapses in Bengaluru
news_content: An old building collapsed in the Vidyaranyapura area of Bengaluru after heavy rains accompanied by hailstorms lashed the city on Sunday, officials said.
author: Anmol Sharma

title: PCB finalises 2 venues for hybrid model
news_content: The Pakistan Cricket Board has reportedly finalised two new venues for a hybrid model hosting of the Asia Cup 2023 amid a dispute between India and Pakistan.
author: Anmol Sharma
